channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping, 17th July
item.description:
We have Communial garages at the back of our properties. People Constantly using it as a dumping ground for bottles and cans, we’ve had microwaves, garden waste, party rubbish bags! we are sick of clearing up! Latest is this fridge freezer and wooden pallet and fridge door!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, Fen Grove, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped Insulation sheets on Setchell Way, 17th July
item.description:

item.title: Graffiti, 17th July

item.title: Regular dumping of fish shop waste on street, 17th July
item.description:
The fishmongers Life of Fish are regularly dumping and amassing their waste on Bellenden Road, for collection once a week on Thursday evenings. It looks extremely unsightly, blocks the pavement and there is the stench of rotten fish. It is attracting swarms of flies. It is also threatening the income of other businesses nearby, eg the cafe Fika right next door - it is very unappealing now for their customers to dine outside at the front. We know people have tried to engage with the Life of Fish on this issue - while the day to day managers are helpful, the owner himself is said to be extremely uncooperative.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 135, Bellenden Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins not being collected properly for months, 17th July
item.description:
Dear team, We continue to have issues with household waste removals - it's been sporadic for months. I've reported before, it was collected then and now it has been missed again. Reference number below if helpful. FixMyStreet ref: 7811164.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsland Road, Hackney, London
